00033     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Vector {
00034 
00035         public:
00036 
00037         //----------  management  ----------
00039 
00040         Vector<D, N> () { }
00042 
00044         Vector<D, N> (N, ... );
00045 
00046         //----------  access      ----------
00047 
00049 
00051         N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00053 
00055         N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00056 
00058         static unsigned dimension (void);
00059 
00060         //----------  arithmetics ----------
00061 
00064         Vector<D, N> &operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00067         Vector<D, N> &operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00070         Vector<D, N> &operator*= (const N &s);
00071 
00073         Vector<D, N> operator- (void) const;
00076         Vector<D, N> operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const;
00079         Vector<D, N> operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const;
00082         Vector<D, N> operator* (const N &s) const;
00084 
00086         N operator* (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00089         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const N &s) const;
00091 
00093         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00094 
00096         N sqnorm (void) const;
00097 
00099 
00101         bool operator<(const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
00102             if (sqnorm() == other.sqnorm()) {
00103                 for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00104                     if (x[i] < other[i]) return true;
00105                     if (x[i] > other[i]) return false;
00106                 }
00107             }
00108             return sqnorm() < other.sqnorm();
00109         }
00110 
00112 
00113         N *data () { return x; }
00114 
00115     private:
00116         N x[D]; 
00117     };

00120             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &, const Vector<D> &);

00126     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00127             Vector<D, N>::Vector (N x0, ... ) :
00128             x () {
00129         x[0] = x0;
00130         unsigned i = 0;
00131         va_list argp;
00132         va_start (argp, x0);
00133         for (i = 1; i < D; i++) {
00134             x[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00135         }
00136         va_end (argp);
00137     }
00138 
00139     //----------  access      ----------

00141     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00142             N &Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00143         assert(i < D);
00144         return x[i];
00145     }
00146 
00147     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00148             N Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00149         assert(i < D);
00150         return x[i];
00151     }
00152 
00153     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00154             unsigned Vector<D, N>::dimension (void) {
00155         return D;
00156     }

00158         //----------  arithmetics ----------

00160     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00161             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00162         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] += Y.x[i];
00163         return *this;
00164     }
00165 
00166     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00167             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00168         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] -= Y.x[i];
00169         return *this;
00170     }
00171 
00172     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00173             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator*= (const N &s) {
00174     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] *= s;
00175     return *this;
00176     }
00177 
00178     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00179             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (void) const {
00180         static Vector<D, N> Z;
00181         Z = *this;
00182         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) Z.x[i] = -x[i] ;
00183         return Z;
00184     }
00185 
00186     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00187             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00188     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00189     Z = *this;
00190     return (Z += Y);
00191     }
00192 
00193     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00194             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00195     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00196     Z = *this;
00197     return (Z -= Y);
00198     }
00199 
00200     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00201             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator* (const N &s) const {
00202     Vector <D, N>Z;
00203     Z = *this;
00204     return Z *= s;
00205     }
00206 
00207     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00208             N Vector<D, N>::operator* (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00209     N dot = 0.;
00210     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00211         if (x[i]) dot += x[i]*Y.x[i];
00212 
00213     return dot;
00214     }
00215 
00216     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00217             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const N &s) const {
00218     return operator* (1./s);
00219     }
00220 
00221     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00222             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const Vector<D, N> &X) const {
00223         Vector<D, N> tmp;
00224         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00225             tmp[i] = x[i]/X[i];
00226         return tmp;
00227     }

00230     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00231             N Vector<D, N>::sqnorm (void) const {
00232     return operator* (*this);
00233     }

00243     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00244             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Vector<D, N> &v) {
00245         //  i might want to use other brackets one day
00246         o << "<";
00247         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < v.dimension ()-1; i++ )
00248         o << v[i] << ",";
00249         o << v[v.dimension ()-1] << ">";
00250         return o;
00251     }

00272             Vector<D> cross (const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &);

00279     template <typename N>
00280             Vector<3, N> vcross (Vector<3, N> a, Vector<3, N> b) {
00281         static Vector<3, N> c;
00282 
00283         c[0] = a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1];
00284         c[1] = a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2];
00285         c[2] = a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0];
00286 
00287         return c;
00288     }
00289 
00291 
00296     template <typename N>
00297             Vector<4, N> vcross (Vector<4, N> a, Vector<4, N> b, Vector<4, N> c) {
00298         static Vector<4, N> d;
00299         N A = b[0]*c[1]-b[1]*c[0],
00300         B = b[0]*c[2]-b[2]*c[0],
00301         C = b[0]*c[3]-b[3]*c[0],
00302         D = b[1]*c[2]-b[2]*c[1],
00303         E = b[1]*c[3]-b[3]*c[1],
00304         F = b[2]*c[3]-b[3]*c[2];
00305 
00306         d[0] =  a[1]*F - a[2]*E + a[3]*D;
00307         d[1] = -a[0]*F + a[2]*C - a[3]*B;
00308         d[2] =  a[0]*E - a[1]*C + a[3]*A;
00309         d[3] = -a[0]*D + a[1]*B - a[2]*A;
00310 
00311         return d;
00312     }
00313 
00315 
00318     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00319             Vector<D, N> vnormalize( const Vector<D, N> &x ) {
00320         static Vector<D, N> n;
00321         N norm = sqrt ( x.sqnorm() );
00322         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++ ) n[i] = x[i]/norm;
00323         return n;
00324     }
00325 }
